overview:
John Ernst is an experienced technologist. He has over 25 years of experience in information technology, engineering and product development. He leads and organizes Faculteâ€™s development and systems efforts.

Prior to Faculte, John was the a Co-Founder of three start-up companies, Snap Lab Media; SaaS mobile engagement, Mobile Content Management Solution and QR Code platform for agencies and enterprises. Expressume (n.k.a. Montage Talent) a SaaS video based talent acquisition solution, and White Sage Media; an online storefront that enables owners of digital content to sell products online. He also served as founder and president for 10 years of software engineering and online marketing firm John Ernst Corporation
